name: FC-Portable Super (included games)
description:
FC-Portable Super is another iteration of handheld devices that can play Famicom (Family Computer) games. Unlike many variations and releases before it, this device seem to work much better in the areas that were troubling the previous devices, mostly sound or compatibility with many of the games. The handheld itself, while enabling you to play on its 2.4" screen, also supports connection to TV and comes with two wireless controllers. The device has slot for Famicom cartridges to play your own game, but comes with a cartridge that contains 30 games on it which can be quickly playable.

The games included (as named on the in-game menu) on the cartridge are:
  • Gem Game
  • Whale
  • Fairy
  • Interstellar
  • Pipe Link
  • Jump Jump
  • One by One
  • Transmission
  • Super Mehica
  • Cool Baby
  • Kicking Mom
  • Goal Keeper
  • Box World
  • Season Garden
  • First Defender
  • Bubbles Puzzle
  • Ellipsoid
  • Ice Cap
  • Goblet Tower
  • Assart
  • Bomb Kind
  • Resistant
  • Shrew House
  • Eidolon's Revenge
  • Rushing Brothers
  • Caper Alone
  • Compoke
  • Aether Copter
  • Doll
  • Revenge of the Flyer
